# Utility Module / Class: EmailTemplateRenderer

A flexible renderer for workflow-related emails, such as "Competitor Agent" invitations or notifications. This class generates a fully-branded HTML email with a step-by-step workflow, highlighting the current step and inserting a call-to-action (CTA) block immediately after the current step. All branding elements (logo, brand name, footer, etc.) are passed in as parameters, making the template reusable for different brands and workflows.

---
